effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target has not selected a damaging move this turn, or if the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail. This move is not affected by iron fist.

short_effect.x_y: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Only works if the target is about to use a damaging move.

flavor_text.x_y: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.
